Articles.Content:
Hello!

I'm trying to create one little plugin. And the problem is I don't know how to access to currently selected maneuver node on map view. I've found a list of all existing maneuver nodes and related orbit changes (in FlightGlobals.ActiveVessel.patchedConicSolver.maneuverNodes), but I can't determine which one is selected for editing. So I need your help!
